title: TERMS OF SERVICE AND PRIVACY POLICY
introduction: By using VintDress, you accept these terms of service and our privacy policy.

content.description: VintDress is an online tool that generates "worn" photographs from a Vinted® link or uploaded image, created by an artificial intelligence model (Replicate).
content.operator: The service is operated by: Miraubolant (SIREN 995105442) – 113 rue saint honoré, 75001 Paris.
features: Generation of AI avatars wearing items
Creation of high-quality photos for sales platforms

conditions: persons aged 13 to 17 with the consent of a parent or legal representative who assumes responsibility for usage.

userAccount.title: User account
userAccount.description: Account creation possible via Google; VintDress collects and stores name, email address and registration date.

generations.title: Generations
generations.description: For each image, the user ID, Vinted link and resulting image are recorded.

conservation.title: Storage
conservation.description: Data stored until six months after last activity, then automatic deletion after email notification.

deletion.title: Account deletion
deletion.description: A dedicated button permanently deletes the account and associated data.

marketing.title: Cross-marketing usage
marketing.description: Miraubolant may, with your consent, use your contact details to present its other projects. Opposition possible at any time.

rights.title: GDPR rights
rights.description: Access, rectification, opposition, deletion; contact: contact@miraubolant.com.

technical.title: Technical data:
items: Error logs to improve the service

sourceImages.title: Source images
sourceImages.description: The user guarantees holding all necessary rights to each Vinted link or submitted content.

generatedImages.title: Generated images
generatedImages.description: In accordance with Replicate's terms, the user holds, to the extent permitted by applicable law, the rights to the model outputs. VintDress reserves a non-exclusive, worldwide and free license to execute the service and, unless written opposition, publicly present results for demonstration or promotion purposes.

forbiddenContent.title: Forbidden content
forbiddenContent.description: In accordance with Replicate's policies, it is forbidden to submit or generate content:
items: of explicit sexual nature, provocative or involving minors,
forbiddenContent.moderation: VintDress applies automatic and manual moderation; any violating account may be suspended or blocked.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: All payments are processed by Stripe; you accept their terms.

credits.title: Individual credits
credits.description: Valid for twelve months from purchase, non-refundable except legal provisions.

subscription.title: Monthly subscription
subscription.description: Automatically renewed; cancellation at any time with rights maintained until end of monthly period.

doubleGeneration.title: Double generation
doubleGeneration.description: A regeneration attempt on the same item returns the existing image without credit debit.

retractation.title: 6. RIGHT OF WITHDRAWAL AND REFUND POLICY

right.title: Right of withdrawal
right.description: In accordance with article L221-28 of the Consumer Code, the fourteen-day right of withdrawal for digital content provided without physical medium does not apply when execution has begun after express prior agreement and waiver of this right. By purchasing credits and launching a generation, the user acknowledges and accepts immediate execution and waives their right of withdrawal for consumed credits.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.subscriptions: Subscriptions: no refund if credits have been used during the current period.
refunds.creditPacks: Credit recharges: the first credit purchase can be refunded on request within fourteen days if the corresponding credits have not been used; credits are then debited (negative balance possible).

inactivity.title: Inactivity
inactivity.description: After six months without connection or generation, the account is considered inactive. A 30-day notice email is sent; without response, the account and data are deleted.

userDeletion.title: User-initiated deletion
userDeletion.consumed: If all credits have been consumed, deletion takes effect after a 60-day notice (time necessary for accounting closure and legal archiving)
userDeletion.remaining: If credits remain available, the user can request proportional refund to the purchase price, minus any promotions, before effective closure.

violation.title: Suspension for non-compliance with terms
violation.description: VintDress may immediately suspend the account; unused credits are then refunded, except in case of serious or intentional violation.

content.description: The user is solely responsible for the use of generated images. Any commercial, automated use, or integration into a third-party platform is prohibited without written authorization. Images do not guarantee any sale; they only improve the visual presentation of the listing.
content.vinted: VintDress is neither affiliated with, sponsored by, nor endorsed by Vinted®. The service operates solely at the user's initiative, without direct interaction with Vinted's servers.

content.service: The service is provided "as is" without guarantee of availability or performance.
content.technical: In case of technical unavailability preventing usage, unused credits are refunded on request.
content.liability: VintDress cannot be held responsible for indirect, commercial or intangible losses.
content.forceMajeure: Force majeure: no party can be held responsible for a failure resulting from an unforeseeable, irresistible and external event (natural disaster, general Internet outage, government decision, etc.).

content.description: Data and images are hosted at Supabase; AI-related processing is performed via Replicate services, acting as a processor under the GDPR. No data is transferred outside the European Economic Area without adequate guarantees provided by the GDPR.

types.title: Types of cookies
types.necessary: Necessary cookies: authentication and session maintenance (mandatory).
types.analytics: Analytics cookies: audience measurement and service improvement (optional, subject to consent).

data.title: Data collected
data.description: IP address, approximate geographic region, device type, pages viewed.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Internal statistics, no resale or sharing with third parties for advertising purposes.

management.title: Consent management
management.description: Consent banner on first visit; modification possible at any time in account settings.

content.description: In accordance with GDPR, you have important rights over your personal data.

accessRights.title: Access and control rights:
items: Right of access: Obtain a copy of your data
Right of rectification: Correct inaccurate information
Right to erasure: Delete your data ("right to be forgotten")
Right to portability: Retrieve your data in a readable format

limitationRights.title: Limitation rights:
items: Right of objection: Refuse certain processing
Right of limitation: Restrict the use of your data
Consent withdrawal: Cancel your agreement at any time
Right of complaint: Contact the CNIL in case of dispute

exercise.title: How to exercise your rights?
exercise.description: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at contact@miraubolant.com specifying:
requirements: A copy of your identity document
exercise.timeframe: We will respond within 30 days maximum.

content.description: VintDress may modify these terms at any time. The update date is authoritative. Any use of the service after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms. Previous versions remain available on request.

notification.title: In case of modification:
items: Email notification at least 30 days before
Publication of the new version on our site
Possibility to contact us for any question

content.description: For any question or request, write to: contact@miraubolant.com
content.law: These terms are governed by French law. The parties undertake to seek an amicable solution before any legal action. Failing this, exclusive jurisdiction is attributed to the courts of Paris (France).

cta.title: QUESTIONS?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help!
